Constructor Detail

TabSwitcherWithPassword

public TabSwitcherWithPassword(javax.swing.JTabbedPane jtp,
                               int tabIndex,
                               java.awt.Component okComponent,
                               java.awt.Component failComponent,
                               char[] password,
                               boolean mode)
Sets up a new TabSwitcherWithPassword. When an action event is received this TabSwitcher will check the given password using the Password class. If mode is true it will check a Station Manager password if mode is false it will check the Network Operator password. If the password was correct it swaps the Component of the tab at index 'tabIndex' of the JTabbedPane 'jtp' to the Component specified by 'okComponent' and otherise it swaps to 'failComponent'.
